segment.name: Beginning of message
segment.documentation: BGM, A segment to indicate the type and function of the message and to transmit its identifying number.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment to specify the date and, when required, the time at which the message has been created as well as other dates and times relevant to the financial transaction (day, month, year).

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 1: A group of segments to give auxiliary references and the relevant dates for the message itself.

segment.name: Reference
segment.documentation: RFF, A segment to give another reference for the message.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment to give the period reported in the message.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 2: A group of segments to give the identification of the reporting agent (generally the bank) or, possibly with a second occurrence, the identification of the bank on behalf of which the declaration is made.

segment.name: Name and address
segment.documentation: NAD, A segment to identify the resident party.

segment.name: Contact information
segment.documentation: CTA, A segment to identify a person or a department for the party specified in the NAD segment and to whom communication should be directed.

segment.name: Communication contact
segment.documentation: COM, A segment to give communication number for the party identified in the NAD segment.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 3: A group of segments to accommodate the details corresponding with one payment ordered via a PAYORD / PAYMUL / PAYEXT message or with BOPINF message received during the relevant period.

segment.name: Line item
segment.documentation: LIN, A segment identifying the line item by a current line number.

segment.name: Financial institution information
segment.documentation: FII, A segment giving the identification of the other financial institution abroad involved in the transaction and possibly the account number.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment to give the processing date of the transaction.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 4: A segment group to give references and dates of the corresponding PAYORD message or the payment order. A second optional occurrence allows the specification of another reference to the same information.

segment.name: Reference
segment.documentation: RFF, A segment to give the serial number of the PAYORD related message or the bank reference of the payment order.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment to give the day, month & year when the related PAYORD message was emitted or when the payment order was performed.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 5: A group of segments giving the identification (and possible details) of the Payee and the Payor and, for declaration on behalf of somebody else, their "declaring agent" .

segment.name: Name and address
segment.documentation: NAD, A segment to identify the resident party.

segment.name: Contact information
segment.documentation: CTA, A segment to identify a person or a department for the party specified in the NAD segment and to whom communication should be directed.

segment.name: Communication contact
segment.documentation: COM, A segment to give a communication number for the party identified in the NAD segment.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 6: A group of segments to give the total amount of the payment and the relevant currencies.

segment.name: Monetary amount
segment.documentation: MOA, A segment to give the total amount of the payment and the relevant currency.

segment.name: Currencies
segment.documentation: CUX, A segment to give the reference currency (e.g. the currency of the account) and the target currency (e.g. the currency of the transfer) of the payment when they are different.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 7: A group of segments providing brief structured cross references to transactions to which the Payment Order relates.

segment.name: Document/message details
segment.documentation: DOC, A segment providing brief structured cross reference to transaction to which the Payment Order relates.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment identifying the date of issue of the document described in the preceding DOC segment group 7.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 8: A group of segments to give the nature of the transaction, the amount and geographical detail. If the payment relates to different transactions or consists of composite payments each transaction has to be specified by its nature, its amount and, if necessary its geographical detail.

segment.name: Requirements and conditions
segment.documentation: RCS, A segment to give the nature of transaction.

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: FTX, A segment to give information in clear and free form about the nature of transaction.

segment.name: Monetary amount
segment.documentation: MOA, A segment to give the amount and the currency of the transaction.

segment.name: Place/location identification
segment.documentation: LOC, A segment to indicate one of the different countries involved in the transaction.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 9: A group of segments to specify the details of authentication.

segment.name: Authentication result
segment.documentation: AUT, A segment to specify the details of any authentication (validation) procedure applied to the BOPCUS message.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment identifying the validation date/time.
